channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Easy Social Box / Page Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Easy Social Box / Page Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-4754|2024-08-03T01:48:40.322Z -- unknown -- easy%20social%20box%20%2F%20page%20plugin
item.description: The Easy Social Box / Page Plugin WordPress plugin through 4.1.2 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
